Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete CoachCRM SaaS application with RBAC and payment integration

This commit includes the full implementation of a professional multi-tenant Coaching CRM system with the following features:

## Core Features:
- âœ… Role-Based Access Control \(RBAC\) with 5 roles \(Owner, Admin, Manager, Coach, Support\)
- âœ… Plan-based feature restrictions \(Standard, Pro, Premium\)
- âœ… Razorpay payment integration with subscription management
- âœ… 7-day trial period with auto-charging
- âœ… Usage tracking and limit warnings
- âœ… WhatsApp integration support
- âœ… AI-powered features \(churn prediction, client insights\)
- âœ… Advanced analytics and reporting
- âœ… Team management and invitations
- âœ… Client management with real-time updates
- âœ… Session scheduling and tracking
- âœ… Payment processing and invoicing
- âœ… Responsive dashboard with sidebar navigation

## Technical Stack:
- Next.js 14.1.0 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Supabase \(PostgreSQL with RLS\)
- Razorpay for payments
- TailwindCSS for styling
- React components with hooks
- Server-side API routes
- Webhook handlers for payment automation

## New Additions in This Commit:
- Role selection during signup
- Feature restriction middleware
- Usage stats component on dashboard
- Plan-based feature gating for analytics, clients, and team members
- Upgrade prompts and limit warnings
- Complete payment workflow from signup to auto-charge

## Database:
- 11 migration files for complete schema
- RLS policies for security
- Triggers for automation
- Subscription and usage tracking tables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add client onboarding, email system, and comprehensive next steps guide

## New Features:

### 1. Client Onboarding Flow
- 3-step wizard for adding clients
- Form validation at each step
- Progress indicator with icons
- Professional UX with step-by-step guidance
- Plan limit checks before adding clients

### 2. Email Notification System
- Professional HTML email templates:
  - Welcome email with trial info
  - Trial ending notification \(customizable days\)
  - Payment success with invoice details
  - Payment failed with retry info
  - Team invitation emails
- Email service abstraction \(works with Resend, SendGrid, AWS SES\)
- Ready for production integration

### 3. UI Components
- Progress component for usage stats
- Supports custom colors and animations
- Used in usage tracking display

### 4. Documentation
- Comprehensive NEXT_STEPS.md guide
- Deployment instructions
- Feature priorities
- Revenue optimization strategies
- Marketing and growth tactics
- Testing checklist
- Launch checklist

## Technical Improvements:
- Better separation of concerns
- Email templates use responsive HTML
- Service layer for email sending
- Environment variables documented

## Ready for Production:
- All core features complete
- Professional user experience
- Scalable email system
- Clear roadmap for future features

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(del CHECKLIST.md IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md NEXT_STEPS.md NEXT_STEPS_ACTION_PLAN.md PROFESSIONAL_WORKFLOW.md QUICK_FIXES.md RBAC_FULL_IMPLEMENTATION_DONE.md SETUP_GUIDE.md)
